metadata.title: USN-4058-2 -- Bash vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-4058-1 fixed a vulnerability in bash. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Bash incorrectly handled the restricted shell. An  attacker could possibly use this issue to escape restrictions and execute  any command.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4058-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  bash-builtins - 4.3-7ubuntu1.8+esm1 bash-doc - 4.3-7ubuntu1.8+esm1 bash-static - 4.3-7ubuntu1.8+esm1 bash - 4.3-7ubuntu1.8+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
